=Jetty=
Jetty Rails is a lightweight Java Web Server that runs Ruby on Rails and Merb applications with the Jetty Container, leveraging the power of JRuby and jruby-rack.

For more information, see [http://jetty-rails.rubyforge.org/].

Capistrano recipes to deploy to a jetty-rails installation are described here:

[http://blog.raphinou.com/2008/12/capistrano-deployment-for-jetty-rails.html]
